body.name: ROIL 14 inch Queen Size Bed Frame with Wood Slats - 3500lbs Heavy Duty No Box Spring Needed Platform, Mattress Stoppers Double Metal Noise Free Bedframe with Headboard Hole
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 8 mins
features: Wooden Slats for Bed Frame: The slats of the queen bed frames is wood, and the platform bed frame queen has 24 wood slats. Premuim poplar made this great bed frame queen, which is strength and durable. The width of each slats is 3.2 inch and use magic tape to fixed the slat to the metal queen bed frame.

No Box Spring Needed: No box spring needed for the queen platform bed frame, noise free bed frames queen has anti-noise bed foot. Non-slip pads protect your floor and make this metal queen bed frames more solid. This bed frame queen is quite durable so it’s a great choice for bedroom, guest rooms, dormitory, apartments and short visiting families or friends.

Under Bed Storage: The 12.4 inch height of the queen size bed frame for easy under-bed storage, Easy to tidy clothes, box, suitcase, toy and quilts. Increase the storage space and neat appearance of the room.

Reserved Hole for Headboard: The black queen bedframe has hole for most of the headboard or foot board. Thickened foot of bed make this platform queen bed frame more comfortable, firm and non-shake structure.

Easy to Assemble: The queen frame bed packed in a box. And package of the double queen bed frame included instructions and free tools. Quick to install in a few minutes. One-year free parts replacement and limited 30-day return policy. Feel free to contact us if you have any other question.
Mattress Stoppers and Anti-slip Leg Pads: 4 plastic mattress stoppers prevents mattress from slipping. Rubber suction pads, more noise-free and anti slip, give a quiet environment.
Due to the we have updated the mattress for free recently, but may still have some in stock without the stoppers. So if you do not receive the mattress stoppers, please contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bed frame for your Buck
reviews.reviewText: The bed frame was easy and fast to assemble with 2 people. It doesn't make any noise, tall enough to storage a lot of things underneath and sturdy. I was afraid of it being too thin, but it was not. Definitely recommend it, if you need some storage space and want a simple bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The full-size platform frame arrived a day early. It arrived in the factory box and weighed a little over 41 lbs. Everything needed for set-up was included in the box: easy instructions, allen wrench, extra screws, foot pads, mattress stoppers, etc. Set-up took between 45 - 60 minutes with the most tedious part being the tightening of the screws. We got this to support a hybrid mattress and, so far, it feels super sturdy and very quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bed months ago, but only started putting it together this week. And noticed a part was not quite right. I contacted the seller and they sent me a correct part right away.The bed itself is sturdy, noiseless and easy to put together. There is room enough to store things underneath which is what I was looking for. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, easy and o build, but missing mattress holders
reviews.reviewText: Great purchase for my daughters first big girl bed. Easy to build! Can store all her toy bins underneath. Searched for 30 minutes for mattress holders to prevent mattress sliding. That was the main reason we choose this frame. Not many issues with mattress sliding though. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very fast set up, clear instructions and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy doesn’t make any noise at all. Fast build. Def worth it. Zero complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing parts that where in description
reviews.reviewText: The purchase description has a complete paragraph that states it includes rubber feet and mattress keepers. They even show them in their pictures of the item. None of these were included in the box. The feet contain a hard plastic foot that slides way to easy if on a wood or lvt floor. Other than that, the entire frame is very well made and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend this bed frame. Great price! Wish I had bought this last year with the mattress we got. The other frame we had only lasted a little over a year. This was very easy to assemble. My bed now is very comfortable and so sturdy! Love it!
